hadith.text: A similar tradition has been transmitted by 'Aishah from the Prophet (ï·º) through a different chain of narrators. Abu Dawud said:And Yunus also narrated in a similar way from al-Zuhri, and no one supported Malik in his narration from 'Urwah from 'Umrah ; and Ma'mar, Ziyad b. Sad and others have also narrated it from al-Zuhri from 'Urwah on the authority of 'Aishah
